text:
Deb Birx just said that wearing masks to prevent spread of Covid-19 is a "NEW DISCOVERY"!  
She's in Dallas with Pence singing her fabulous praises of Gov Abbott!  
And Ben Carson is there!! Why?? He has nothing to do with this issue!
